typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Asset_ID as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Project_ID as string,
		Reporting_Period as string,
		Primary_Management_Activity as string,
		Project_Objectives as string,
		Expected_Value_Impact as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> LoadFromScrubbedToStagingDB
source(output(
		Asset_ID as string,
		Fund_ID as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT DISTINCT [Asset_ID],[Fund_ID]\nFROM [relational].[Asset]\nWHERE record_deleted_flag = 0',
	format: 'query') ~> RelationalAsset
ValidatedDateAndID@ValidDateAndID, SelectRelationalAsset lookup(Asset_ID == Relation_Asset_ID
	&& Fund_ID == Relation_Fund_ID,
	multiple: true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LookupRelationAsset
ValidatedAsset@ValidFundAndAsset select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Project_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		Primary_Management_Activity,
		Project_Objectives,
		Expected_Value_Impact
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectValidRecord
ConvertDateAndIncidentID split(not(isNull(Derived_Project_ID)) && not(isNull(Derived_Reporting_Period)),
	disjoint: false) ~> ValidatedDateAndID@(ValidDateAndID, InvalidDateOrID)
LoadFromScrubbedToStagingDB derive(Derived_Reporting_Period = toDate(Reporting_Period,"dd/MM/yyyy"),
		Derived_Project_ID = toInteger(Project_ID)) ~> ConvertDateAndIncidentID
InvalidDateOrIDErrormessage select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Project_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		Primary_Management_Activity,
		Project_Objectives,
		Expected_Value_Impact,
		Validation_Error
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectInvalidDateOrID
ValidatedDateAndID@InvalidDateOrID derive(Validation_Error = toString("Invalid Reporting Period / Project ID")) ~> InvalidDateOrIDErrormessage
RelationalAsset select(mapColumn(
		Relation_Asset_ID = Asset_ID,
		Relation_Fund_ID = Fund_ID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectRelationalAsset
LookupRelationAsset split(not(isNull(Relation_Asset_ID)),
	disjoint: false) ~> ValidatedAsset@(ValidFundAndAsset, InvalidFundOrAsset)
ValidatedAsset@InvalidFundOrAsset derive(Validation_Error = toString("Invalid Fund Or Asset")) ~> InvalidFundOrAsseterrormessage
InvalidFundOrAsseterrormessage select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Project_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		Primary_Management_Activity,
		Project_Objectives,
		Expected_Value_Impact,
		Validation_Error
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectInvalidFundOrAsset
SelectValidRecord, SelectInvalidDateOrID, SelectInvalidFundOrAsset union(byName: true)~> UnionAll
UnionAll sink(input(
		Asset_ID as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Project_ID as string,
		Reporting_Period as string,
		Primary_Management_Activity as string,
		Project_Objectives as string,
		Expected_Value_Impact as string,
		Validation_Error as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	truncate:true,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Project_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		Primary_Management_Activity,
		Project_Objectives,
		Expected_Value_Impact,
		Validation_Error
	)) ~> StagingDB

source(output(
		Asset_ID as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Timber_Sales_ID as string,
		Reporting_Period as string,
		Species_Code as string,
		Customer as string,
		Domestic_Export as string,
		Product_Type_Code as string,
		Delivery_Point_Code as string,
		Price_Point_Code as string,
		Sales_Unit_Code as string,
		Sales_Quantity as string,
		Sales_Revenue as string,
		Production_Cost as string,
		Stumpage as string,
		Unit_Stumpage as string,
		Currency_Code as string,
		Sales_Month as string,
		Average_Sales_Price as string,
		Budget_Sales_Quantity as string,
		Budget_Sales_Revenue as string,
		Budget_Production_Cost as string,
		Budget_Stumpage as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> LoadFromScrubbedToStagingDB
source(output(
		Asset_ID as string,
		Fund_ID as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT DISTINCT [Asset_ID],[Fund_ID]\nFROM [relational].[Asset]\nWHERE record_deleted_flag = 0',
	format: 'query') ~> RelationalAsset
source(output(
		Species_Code as string,
		Species as string,
		Species_Group as string,
		Active_YN as string,
		Insert_Datetime as timestamp,
		Update_Datetime as timestamp,
		Process_Name as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> RelationalSpeciesType
source(output(
		Product_Type_Code as string,
		Product_Type as string,
		Active_YN as string,
		Insert_Datetime as timestamp,
		Update_Datetime as timestamp,
		Process_Name as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> RelationalProductType
source(output(
		Price_Point_Code as string,
		Price_Point as string,
		Active_YN as string,
		Insert_Datetime as timestamp,
		Update_Datetime as timestamp,
		Process_Name as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> RelationalPricePoint
source(output(
		Sales_Unit_Code as string,
		Sales_Unit as string,
		Active_YN as string,
		Insert_Datetime as timestamp,
		Update_Datetime as timestamp,
		Process_Name as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> RelationalSalesUnit
ValidatedTimberSalesIDandDateandDecimal@ValidDateAndTimberSalesIDandNumbers, SelectRelationalAsset lookup(Asset_ID == Relation_Asset_ID
	&& Fund_ID == Relation_Fund_ID,
	multiple: true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LookupRelationAsset
IsValidSalesUnit@ValidSalesUnit select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Timber_Sale_ID = Timber_Sales_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		Species_Code,
		Customer,
		Domestic_Export,
		Product_Type_Code,
		Price_Point_Code,
		Sales_Unit_Code,
		Sales_Quantity,
		Sales_Revenue,
		Production_Cost,
		Stumpage,
		Unit_Stumpage,
		Currency_Code,
		Average_Sales_Price,
		Budget_Sales_Quantity,
		Budget_Sales_Revenue,
		Budget_Production_Cost,
		Budget_Stumpage,
		Delivery_Point_Code,
		Sales_Month
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectValidRecord
ConvertDateAndTimberSalesID split(not(isNull(Derived_Timber_Sales_ID)) && not(isNull(Derived_Reporting_Period)) && 
iif(not(isNull(Sales_Quantity)),not(isNull(Derived_Sales_Quantity)),true()) &&
iif(not(isNull(Sales_Revenue)),not(isNull(Derived_Sales_Revenue)),true()) &&
iif(not(isNull(Derived_Production_Cost)),not(isNull(Production_Cost)),true()) &&
iif(not(isNull(Stumpage)),not(isNull(Derived_Stumpage)),true()) &&
iif(not(isNull(Unit_Stumpage)),not(isNull(Derived_Unit_Stumpage)),true()) && 
iif(not(isNull(Average_Sales_Price)),not(isNull(Derived_Average_Sales_Price)),true()) &&
iif(not(isNull(Budget_Sales_Quantity)),not(isNull(Derived_Budget_Sales_Quantity)),true()) &&
iif(not(isNull(Budget_Sales_Revenue)),not(isNull(Derived_Budget_Sales_Revenue)),true()) &&
iif(not(isNull(Budget_Production_Cost)),not(isNull(Derived_Budget_Production_Cost)),true()) &&
iif(not(isNull(Budget_Stumpage)),not(isNull(Derived_Budget_Stumpage)),true()),
	disjoint: false) ~> ValidatedTimberSalesIDandDateandDecimal@(ValidDateAndTimberSalesIDandNumbers, InvalidDateOrTimberSlaesIDOrNumbers)
LoadFromScrubbedToStagingDB derive(Derived_Reporting_Period = toDate(Reporting_Period,"dd/MM/yyyy"),
		Derived_Timber_Sales_ID = toInteger(Timber_Sales_ID),
		Derived_Sales_Quantity = toDecimal(Sales_Quantity, 19, 4, "###,###.####"),
		Derived_Sales_Revenue = toDecimal(Sales_Revenue, 19, 4, "###,###.####"),
		Derived_Production_Cost = toDecimal(Production_Cost, 19, 4, "###,###.####"),
		Derived_Stumpage = toDecimal(Stumpage, 19, 4, "###,###.####"),
		Derived_Unit_Stumpage = toDecimal(Unit_Stumpage, 19, 4, "###,###.####"),
		Derived_Average_Sales_Price = toDecimal(Average_Sales_Price, 19, 4, "###,###.####"),
		Derived_Budget_Sales_Quantity = toDecimal(Budget_Sales_Quantity, 19, 4, "###,###.####"),
		Derived_Budget_Sales_Revenue = toDecimal(Budget_Sales_Revenue, 19, 4, "###,###.####"),
		Derived_Budget_Production_Cost = toDecimal(Budget_Production_Cost, 19, 4, "###,###.####"),
		Derived_Budget_Stumpage = toDecimal(Budget_Stumpage, 19, 4, "###,###.####")) ~> ConvertDateAndTimberSalesID
InvalidDateOrTimberSalesIDOrNumbererrormessage select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Timber_Sale_ID = Timber_Sales_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		Species_Code,
		Customer,
		Domestic_Export,
		Product_Type_Code,
		Price_Point_Code,
		Sales_Unit_Code,
		Sales_Quantity,
		Sales_Revenue,
		Production_Cost,
		Stumpage,
		Unit_Stumpage,
		Currency_Code,
		Average_Sales_Price,
		Budget_Sales_Quantity,
		Budget_Sales_Revenue,
		Budget_Production_Cost,
		Budget_Stumpage,
		Validation_Error
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectInvalidDateOrTimberSlaesIDOrNumbers
ValidatedTimberSalesIDandDateandDecimal@InvalidDateOrTimberSlaesIDOrNumbers derive(Validation_Error = toString("Invalid Reporting Period  / Timber Sales ID / Sales Quantity / Sales Revenue / Production Cost / Stumpage / Unit Stumpage / Average Sale Price / Budget Sale Quantity / Budget Sale Revenue / Budget Production Cost / Budget Stumpage")) ~> InvalidDateOrTimberSalesIDOrNumbererrormessage
RelationalAsset select(mapColumn(
		Relation_Asset_ID = Asset_ID,
		Relation_Fund_ID = Fund_ID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectRelationalAsset
LookupRelationAsset split(not(isNull(Relation_Asset_ID)),
	disjoint: false) ~> ValidatedAsset@(ValidFundAndAsset, InvalidFundOrAsset)
ValidatedAsset@InvalidFundOrAsset derive(Validation_Error = toString("Invalid Fund Or Asset")) ~> InvalidFundOrAsseterrormessage
InvalidFundOrAsseterrormessage select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Timber_Sale_ID = Timber_Sales_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		Species_Code,
		Customer,
		Domestic_Export,
		Product_Type_Code,
		Price_Point_Code,
		Sales_Unit_Code,
		Sales_Quantity,
		Sales_Revenue,
		Production_Cost,
		Stumpage,
		Unit_Stumpage,
		Currency_Code,
		Average_Sales_Price,
		Budget_Sales_Quantity,
		Budget_Sales_Revenue,
		Budget_Production_Cost,
		Budget_Stumpage,
		Validation_Error
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectInvalidFundOrAsset
SelectValidRecord, SelectInvalidDateOrTimberSlaesIDOrNumbers, SelectInvalidFundOrAsset, SelectInvalidSpeciesType, IsValidSpeciesType@ValidSpeciesType, SelectInvalidSalesUnit union(byName: true)~> UnionAll
ValidatedAsset@ValidFundAndAsset, SelectRelationalSpeciesType lookup(Species_Code == Relation_Species_Code,
	multiple: true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LookupRelationalSpeciesType
RelationalSpeciesType select(mapColumn(
		Relation_Species_Code = Species_Code
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectRelationalSpeciesType
LookupRelationalSpeciesType split(not(isNull(Relation_Species_Code)),
	disjoint: false) ~> IsValidSpeciesType@(ValidSpeciesType, InvalidSpeciesType)
IsValidSpeciesType@InvalidSpeciesType derive(Validation_Error = toString("Invalid Species Code")) ~> InvalidSpeciesTypeerrormessage
InvalidSpeciesTypeerrormessage select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Timber_Sale_ID = Timber_Sales_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		Species_Code,
		Customer,
		Domestic_Export,
		Product_Type_Code,
		Price_Point_Code,
		Sales_Unit_Code,
		Sales_Quantity,
		Sales_Revenue,
		Production_Cost,
		Stumpage,
		Unit_Stumpage,
		Currency_Code,
		Average_Sales_Price,
		Budget_Sales_Quantity,
		Budget_Sales_Revenue,
		Budget_Production_Cost,
		Budget_Stumpage,
		Validation_Error
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectInvalidSpeciesType
RelationalProductType select(mapColumn(
		Relation_Product_Type_Code = Product_Type_Code
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectRelationalProductType
RelationalPricePoint select(mapColumn(
		Relation_Price_Point_Code = Price_Point_Code
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectRelationalPricePoint
RelationalSalesUnit select(mapColumn(
		Relation_Sales_Unit_Code = Sales_Unit_Code
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectRelationalSalesUnit
IsValidSpeciesType@ValidSpeciesType, SelectRelationalSalesUnit lookup(Sales_Unit_Code == Relation_Sales_Unit_Code,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LookupSalesUnit
LookupSalesUnit split(not(isNull(Relation_Sales_Unit_Code)),
	disjoint: false) ~> IsValidSalesUnit@(ValidSalesUnit, InvalidSalesUnit)
IsValidSalesUnit@InvalidSalesUnit derive(Validation_Error = toString("Invalid Sales Unit Code")) ~> InvalidSaleUniterrormessage
InvalidSaleUniterrormessage select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Timber_Sale_ID = Timber_Sales_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		Species_Code,
		Customer,
		Domestic_Export,
		Product_Type_Code,
		Price_Point_Code,
		Sales_Unit_Code,
		Sales_Quantity,
		Sales_Revenue,
		Production_Cost,
		Stumpage,
		Unit_Stumpage,
		Currency_Code,
		Average_Sales_Price,
		Budget_Sales_Quantity,
		Budget_Sales_Revenue,
		Budget_Production_Cost,
		Budget_Stumpage,
		Validation_Error
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectInvalidSalesUnit
UnionAll sink(input(
		Asset_ID as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Timber_Sale_ID as string,
		Reporting_Period as string,
		Species_Code as string,
		Customer as string,
		Domestic_Export as string,
		Product_Type_Code as string,
		Price_Point_Code as string,
		Sales_Unit_Code as string,
		Sales_Quantity as string,
		Sales_Revenue as string,
		Production_Cost as string,
		Stumpage as string,
		Unit_Stumpage as string,
		Currency_Code as string,
		Average_Sales_Price as string,
		Budget_Sales_Quantity as string,
		Budget_Sales_Revenue as string,
		Budget_Production_Cost as string,
		Budget_Stumpage as string,
		Validation_Error as string,
		Product as string,
		Delivery_Point_Code as string,
		Price_Point as string,
		Sales_Month as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	truncate:true,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Timber_Sale_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		Species_Code,
		Customer,
		Domestic_Export,
		Product = Product_Type_Code,
		Price_Point = Price_Point_Code,
		Sales_Unit_Code,
		Sales_Quantity,
		Sales_Revenue,
		Production_Cost,
		Stumpage,
		Unit_Stumpage,
		Currency_Code,
		Average_Sales_Price,
		Budget_Sales_Quantity,
		Budget_Sales_Revenue,
		Budget_Production_Cost,
		Budget_Stumpage,
		Validation_Error,
		Delivery_Point_Code,
		Sales_Month
	)) ~> StagingDB

transformations.name: ValidateMandatoryColumns
transformations.description: ReportingDateCertificationIDValidateMsg is a test and should be considered as part of the conditional split Insert/Update activity

transformations.name: SplitInsertAndUpdate
transformations.description:
1. The condition assume that the records from the current reporting period are deleted first if any (asset id, fund id, current reporting period)
2. Records where reporting period equal current reporting period (disregard certification id) are inserted/reinserted after delete in 1
3. Remaining records are not from current reporting period and the certification ids must not be null. These are updated

typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	MasterUtcTag as string,
	CurrentRunDateTime as string,
	WorkbookName as string,
	TabName as string,
	CurrentQuarterDate as string,
	MasterPipeline as string
}
source(output(
		Asset_ID as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Reporting_Period as string,
		Certification_ID as string,
		Validation_Flag as string,
		Certification_Type as string,
		Certification_Number as string,
		Next_Audit_Date as string,
		Certifying_Body as string,
		Certification_Date as string,
		Certification_End_Date as string,
		Certified_Entity as string,
		Number_of_Open_Minor_CARS as string,
		Number_of_Open_Major_CARS as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> SourceDataTab
source(output(
		Certification_Type_Code as string,
		Certification_Type as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT Certification_Type_Code\n      ,Certification_Type\n  FROM relational.OPS_Certification_Type\n  WHERE Active_YN = \'Y\'',
	format: 'query',
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> RelationalOpsCertificationType
source(output(
		Asset_ID as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Reporting_Period as date,
		Certification_ID as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT Asset_ID\n      ,Fund_ID\n      ,Reporting_Period\n      ,Certification_ID\n  FROM relational.OPS_Certification',
	format: 'query') ~> RelationalCertification
LookupCertificationType derive(CertificationTypeValidateMsg = iif(isNull(Certification_Type_Code_Lkp), "Certification Type/", ""),
		AssetReportingDateValidateMsg = iif(isNull(Asset_ID) || isNull(Fund_ID) || isNull(Reporting_Period), "Invalid Asset or Reporting Period/", ""),
		CertificationEndDateValidateMsg = iif(isNull(Certification_End_Date), "Certification End Date/", ""),
		ReportingDateCertificationIDValidateMsg = iif(iif(CurrentReportingPeriod != Reporting_Period, true(), false()) && isNull(Certification_ID),"Null Certification ID for non-current Reporting Period/",""),
		LkpRelationalCertificationIDValidateMsg = iif(not(isNull(Certification_Certification_ID_Lkp)),
iif(equals(concat(Certification_Asset_ID_Lkp,Certification_Fund_ID_Lkp), concat(Asset_ID,Fund_ID)),"","Certitication ID not belong to Asset/"),"")) ~> ValidateMandatoryColumns
ValidateMandatoryColumns split(length(concatWS('',AssetReportingDateValidateMsg,
LkpRelationalCertificationIDValidateMsg,
CertificationTypeValidateMsg,
CertificationEndDateValidateMsg,
ReportingDateCertificationIDValidateMsg)) == 0,
	disjoint: false) ~> SegregateValidInvalidRows@(ValidRows, InvalidRows)
SplitInsertAndUpdate@Insert select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		Certification_ID,
		Certification_Number,
		Next_Audit_Date,
		Certifying_Body,
		Certification_Date,
		Certification_End_Date,
		Certified_Entity,
		Number_of_Open_Minor_CARS,
		Number_of_Open_Major_CARS,
		Insert_Datetime,
		Update_Datetime,
		Process_Name,
		Certification_Type_Code = Certification_Type_Code_Lkp
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectedColumnsOutputInsert
SegregateValidInvalidRows@InvalidRows derive(ConcatenatedMessage = concat(CertificationTypeValidateMsg, 
CertificationEndDateValidateMsg,
AssetReportingDateValidateMsg,
ReportingDateCertificationIDValidateMsg,
LkpRelationalCertificationIDValidateMsg)) ~> ConcatenateInvalidColumnsMessage
ConcatenateInvalidColumnsMessage select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		Certification_ID,
		Validation_Flag,
		Certification_Type,
		Certification_Number,
		Next_Audit_Date,
		Certifying_Body,
		Certification_Date,
		Certification_End_Date,
		Certified_Entity,
		Number_of_Open_Minor_CARS,
		Number_of_Open_Major_CARS,
		Insert_Datetime,
		Update_Datetime,
		Work_Book,
		Work_Sheet,
		Process_Name,
		RowNumber,
		Certification_Type_Code_Lkp,
		Certification_Type_Lkp,
		CertificationTypeValidateMsg,
		CertificationEndDateValidateMsg,
		ConcatenatedMessage
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectedOutputColumnsError
DateTypeTransform keyGenerate(output(RowNumber as long),
	startAt: 1L,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> GenerateRowNumber
GenerateRowNumber filter(RowNumber > 1) ~> ExcludeFirstRow
SelectWorksheetAsset aggregate(groupBy(Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Work_Book,
		Work_Sheet),
	AggCount = count()) ~> AggregateSetUniqueWorksheetAsset
ExcludeFirstRow select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Work_Book,
		Work_Sheet
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectWorksheetAsset
AggregateSetUniqueWorksheetAsset select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Work_Book,
		Work_Sheet
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectUniqueWorksheetAsset
SourceDataTab derive(Certification_ID = toInteger(Certification_ID),
		Reporting_Period = toDate(Reporting_Period),
		Next_Audit_Date = toDate(Next_Audit_Date),
		Certification_Date = toDate(Certification_Date),
		Certification_End_Date = toDate(Certification_End_Date),
		Number_of_Open_Minor_CARS = toInteger(Number_of_Open_Minor_CARS),
		Number_of_Open_Major_CARS = toInteger(Number_of_Open_Major_CARS),
		Insert_Datetime = fromUTC(currentUTC(), 'Australia/Sydney'),
		Update_Datetime = toTimestamp('9999-12-31 00:00:00'),
		Work_Book = $WorkbookName,
		Work_Sheet = $TabName,
		Process_Name = concatWS('-',$MasterPipeline,$WorkbookName,$TabName),
		CurrentReportingPeriod = toDate($CurrentQuarterDate)) ~> DateTypeTransform
RelationalOpsCertificationType select(mapColumn(
		Certification_Type_Code_Lkp = Certification_Type_Code,
		Certification_Type_Lkp = Certification_Type
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectCertificationTypeLkp
LookupCertification, SelectCertificationTypeLkp lookup(Certification_Type == Certification_Type_Lkp,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'first',
	asc(Certification_Type_Code_Lkp, false),
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LookupCertificationType
SegregateValidInvalidRows@ValidRows split(equals(Reporting_Period, CurrentReportingPeriod),
	disjoint: false) ~> SplitInsertAndUpdate@(Insert, Update)
UpdateDatetimeValue select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		Certification_ID,
		Certification_Number,
		Next_Audit_Date,
		Certifying_Body,
		Certification_Date,
		Certification_End_Date,
		Certified_Entity,
		Number_of_Open_Minor_CARS,
		Number_of_Open_Major_CARS,
		Insert_Datetime,
		Update_Datetime,
		Process_Name,
		Certification_Type_Code = Certification_Type_Code_Lkp
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectColumnsOutputUpdate
SplitInsertAndUpdate@Update derive(Update_Datetime = fromUTC(currentUTC(), 'Australia/Sydney')) ~> UpdateDatetimeValue
RelationalCertification select(mapColumn(
		Certification_Asset_ID_Lkp = Asset_ID,
		Certification_Fund_ID_Lkp = Fund_ID,
		Certification_Reporting_Period_Lkp = Reporting_Period,
		Certification_Certification_ID_Lkp = Certification_ID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectCertificationLkp
ExcludeFirstRow, SelectCertificationLkp lookup(Certification_ID == Certification_Certification_ID_Lkp,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LookupCertification

	validateSchema: false,

	mapColumn(

		Certification_Number,

	),

SourceReadyLoad select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Reporting_Period
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectColumnsForDelete
SelectColumnsForDelete aggregate(groupBy(Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Reporting_Period),
	UniqueCount = count()) ~> AggregateAssetFundReportingPeriod
AggregateAssetFundReportingPeriod alterRow(deleteIf(UniqueCount>0)) ~> AlterRowDelete
AlterRowDelete sink(input(
		Asset_ID as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Certification_ID as integer,

	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:true,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	keys:['Asset_ID','Fund_ID','Reporting_Period'],
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Reporting_Period
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> TargetRelationalDelete

	),

AlterRowUpdate sink(input(
		Asset_ID as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Certification_ID as integer,
		Reporting_Period as date,
		Certification_Type_Code as string,
		Certification_Number as string,

	),

transformations.name: ValidateMandatoryColumns
transformations.description: ReportingDateCertificationIDValidateMsg is a test and should be considered as part of the conditional split Insert/Update activity

typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	MasterUtcTag as string,
	CurrentRunDateTime as string,
	WorkbookName as string,
	TabName as string,
	CurrentQuarterDate as string,
	MasterPipeline as string
}
source(output(
		Asset_ID as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Reporting_Period as string,
		Validation_Flag as string,
		Customer as string,
		Domestic_or_Export as string,
		Species as string,
		Product_Type as string,
		Delivery_Point as string,
		Price_Point as string,
		Sales_Unit as string,
		Sales_Quantity as string,
		Average_Sales_Price as string,
		Sales_Revenue as string,
		Production_Cost as string,
		Stumpage as string,
		Unit_Stumpage as string,
		Currency as string,
		Month as string,
		Budget_Sales_Quantity as string,
		Budget_Sales_Revenue as string,
		Budget_Production_Cost as string,
		Budget_Unit_Stumpage as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> SourceDataTab
source(output(
		Species_Code as string,
		Species as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT [Species_Code]\n      ,[Species]\n  FROM [relational].[OPS_Species_Type]\n  WHERE [Active_YN] = \'Y\'',
	format: 'query',
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> RelationalSpeciesType
source(output(
		Sales_Unit_Code as string,
		Sales_Unit as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT Sales_Unit_Code\n      ,Sales_Unit\n  FROM relational.OPS_Sales_Unit\n  WHERE Active_YN = \'Y\'',
	format: 'query') ~> RelationalSalesUnit
source(output(
		Price_Point_Code as string,
		Price_Point as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT Price_Point_Code\n      ,Price_Point\n  FROM relational.OPS_Price_Point\n  WHERE Active_YN = \'Y\'',
	format: 'query') ~> RelationalDeliveryPoint
LookupPricePointFromDeliveryPoint derive(SpeciesTypeValidateMsg = iif(isNull(Species_Code_Lkp), "Species/", ""),
		SalesUnitValidateMsg = iif(isNull(Sales_Unit_Code_Lkp), "Sales Unit/", ""),
		AssetReportingDateValidateMsg = iif(isNull(Asset_ID) || isNull(Fund_ID) || isNull(Reporting_Period), "Invalid Asset or Reporting Period/", ""),
		DeliveryPointValidateMsg = iif(isNull(Price_Point_Code_Lkp), "Delivery Point/", "")) ~> ValidateMandatoryColumns
ValidateMandatoryColumns split(length(concatWS('',SpeciesTypeValidateMsg,
SalesUnitValidateMsg,
DeliveryPointValidateMsg,
AssetReportingDateValidateMsg)) == 0,
	disjoint: false) ~> SegregateValidInvalidRows@(ValidRows, InvalidRows)
SegregateValidInvalidRows@ValidRows select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		Customer,
		Domestic_Export = Domestic_or_Export,
		Product = Product_Type,
		Delivery_Point_Code = Delivery_Point,
		Price_Point,
		Sales_Quantity,
		Average_Sales_Price,
		Sales_Revenue,
		Production_Cost,
		Stumpage,
		Unit_Stumpage,
		Currency_Code = Currency,
		Sales_Month = Month,
		Budget_Sales_Quantity,
		Budget_Sales_Revenue,
		Budget_Production_Cost,
		Budget_Stumpage = Budget_Unit_Stumpage,
		Insert_Datetime,
		Update_Datetime,
		Process_Name,
		Sales_Unit_Code = Sales_Unit_Code_Lkp,
		Species_Code = Species_Code_Lkp
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectedColumnsOutputInsert
SegregateValidInvalidRows@InvalidRows derive(ConcatenatedMessage = concat(SpeciesTypeValidateMsg,
SalesUnitValidateMsg,
AssetReportingDateValidateMsg,
DeliveryPointValidateMsg)) ~> ConcatenateInvalidColumnsMessage
ConcatenateInvalidColumnsMessage select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		Validation_Flag,
		Customer,
		Domestic_Export = Domestic_or_Export,
		Species,
		Product = Product_Type,
		Delivery_Point_Code = Delivery_Point,
		Price_Point,
		Sales_Unit,
		Sales_Quantity,
		Average_Sales_Price,
		Sales_Revenue,
		Production_Cost,
		Stumpage,
		Unit_Stumpage,
		Currency_Code = Currency,
		Sales_Month = Month,
		Budget_Sales_Quantity,
		Budget_Sales_Revenue,
		Budget_Production_Cost,
		Budget_Stumpage = Budget_Unit_Stumpage,
		Insert_Datetime,
		Source_File = Work_Book,
		Source_Sub_File = Work_Sheet,
		Process_Name,
		Error_Desc = ConcatenatedMessage
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectedOutputColumnsError
DateTypeTransform keyGenerate(output(RowNumber as long),
	startAt: 1L,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> GenerateRowNumber
GenerateRowNumber filter(RowNumber > 1) ~> ExcludeFirstRow
SelectWorksheetAsset aggregate(groupBy(Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Work_Book,
		Work_Sheet),
	AggCount = count()) ~> AggregateSetUniqueWorksheetAsset
ExcludeFirstRow select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Work_Book,
		Work_Sheet
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectWorksheetAsset
AggregateSetUniqueWorksheetAsset select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Work_Book,
		Work_Sheet
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectUniqueWorksheetAsset
SourceDataTab derive(Insert_Datetime = fromUTC(currentUTC(), 'Australia/Sydney'),
		Update_Datetime = toTimestamp('9999-12-31 00:00:00'),
		Work_Book = $WorkbookName,
		Work_Sheet = $TabName,
		Process_Name = concatWS('-',$MasterPipeline,$WorkbookName,$TabName),
		CurrentReportingPeriod = toDate($CurrentQuarterDate),
		Reporting_Period = toDate(Reporting_Period),
		Sales_Quantity = toDecimal(Sales_Quantity, 19, 4),
		Sales_Revenue = toDecimal(Sales_Revenue, 19, 4),
		Production_Cost = toDecimal(Production_Cost, 19, 4),
		Stumpage = toDecimal(Stumpage, 19, 4),
		Unit_Stumpage = toDecimal(Unit_Stumpage, 19, 4),
		Average_Sales_Price = toDecimal(Average_Sales_Price, 19, 4),
		Budget_Sales_Quantity = toDecimal(Budget_Sales_Quantity, 19, 4),
		Budget_Sales_Revenue = toDecimal(Budget_Sales_Revenue, 19, 4),
		Budget_Production_Cost = toDecimal(Budget_Production_Cost, 19, 4),
		Budget_Unit_Stumpage = toDecimal(Budget_Unit_Stumpage, 19, 4),
		Price_Point = toDecimal(Price_Point, 19, 4),
		Month = toDate(Month)) ~> DateTypeTransform
RelationalSpeciesType select(mapColumn(
		Species_Code_Lkp = Species_Code,
		Species_Lkp = Species
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectSpeciesTypeLkp
LookupSalesUnit, SelectSpeciesTypeLkp lookup(Species == Species_Lkp,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LookupSpeciesType
RelationalSalesUnit select(mapColumn(
		Sales_Unit_Code_Lkp = Sales_Unit_Code,
		Sales_Unit_Lkp = Sales_Unit
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectSalesUnitLkp
ExcludeFirstRow, SelectSalesUnitLkp lookup(Sales_Unit == Sales_Unit_Lkp,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LookupSalesUnit
RelationalDeliveryPoint select(mapColumn(
		Price_Point_Code_Lkp = Price_Point_Code,
		Price_Point_Lkp = Price_Point
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectPricePointLkp
LookupSpeciesType, SelectPricePointLkp lookup(Delivery_Point == Price_Point_Code_Lkp,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LookupPricePointFromDeliveryPoint
SelectedColumnsOutputInsert sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	partitionFileNames:[(concatWS("_", $WorkbookName, $TabName,$CurrentQuarterDate,'LoadReady'))],
	mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		Customer,
		Domestic_Export,
		Product,
		Delivery_Point_Code,
		Price_Point,
		Sales_Quantity,
		Average_Sales_Price,
		Sales_Revenue,
		Production_Cost,
		Stumpage,
		Unit_Stumpage,
		Currency_Code,
		Sales_Month,
		Budget_Sales_Quantity,
		Budget_Sales_Revenue,
		Budget_Production_Cost,
		Budget_Stumpage,
		Insert_Datetime,
		Update_Datetime,
		Process_Name,
		Sales_Unit_Code,
		Species_Code
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> TargetPersistentParquetInsert
SelectedOutputColumnsError sink(input(
		Error_ID as long,
		Asset_ID as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Timber_Sale_ID as integer,
		Reporting_Period as date,
		Species as string,
		Customer as string,
		Domestic_Export as string,
		Product_Type_Code as string,
		Price_Point_Code as string,
		Sales_Unit as string,
		Sales_Quantity as decimal(19,4),
		Sales_Revenue as decimal(19,4),
		Production_Cost as decimal(19,4),
		Stumpage as decimal(19,4),
		Unit_Stumpage as decimal(19,4),
		Currency_Code as string,
		Average_Sales_Price as decimal(19,4),
		Budget_Sales_Quantity as decimal(19,4),
		Budget_Sales_Revenue as decimal(19,4),
		Budget_Production_Cost as decimal(19,4),
		Budget_Stumpage as decimal(19,4),
		Insert_Datetime as timestamp,
		Process_Name as string,
		Product as string,
		Delivery_Point_Code as string,
		Price_Point as decimal(19,4),
		Sales_Month as date,
		Source_File as string,
		Source_Sub_File as string,
		Error_Desc as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		Species,
		Customer,
		Domestic_Export,
		Sales_Unit,
		Sales_Quantity,
		Sales_Revenue,
		Production_Cost,
		Stumpage,
		Unit_Stumpage,
		Currency_Code,
		Average_Sales_Price,
		Budget_Sales_Quantity,
		Budget_Sales_Revenue,
		Budget_Production_Cost,
		Budget_Stumpage,
		Insert_Datetime,
		Process_Name,
		Product,
		Delivery_Point_Code,
		Price_Point,
		Sales_Month,
		Source_File,
		Source_Sub_File,
		Error_Desc
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> ErrorTable
SelectUniqueWorksheetAsset sink(input(
		Work_Book as string,
		Work_Sheet as string,
		Asset_Id as string,
		Fund_Id as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		Work_Book,
		Work_Sheet,
		Asset_Id = Asset_ID,
		Fund_Id = Fund_ID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> OpsWorkbookWorksheetList

parameters{
	WorkbookName as string,
	TabName as string
}
source(output(
		Asset_ID as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Reporting_Period as date,
		Customer as string,
		Domestic_Export as string,
		Product as string,
		Delivery_Point_Code as string,
		Price_Point as decimal(19,4),
		Sales_Quantity as decimal(19,4),
		Average_Sales_Price as decimal(19,4),
		Sales_Revenue as decimal(19,4),
		Production_Cost as decimal(19,4),
		Stumpage as decimal(19,4),
		Unit_Stumpage as decimal(19,4),
		Currency_Code as string,
		Sales_Month as date,
		Budget_Sales_Quantity as decimal(19,4),
		Budget_Sales_Revenue as decimal(19,4),
		Budget_Production_Cost as decimal(19,4),
		Budget_Stumpage as decimal(19,4),
		Insert_Datetime as timestamp,
		Update_Datetime as timestamp,
		Process_Name as string,
		Sales_Unit_Code as string,
		Species_Code as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> SourceReadyLoad
SourceReadyLoad select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Reporting_Period
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectKeyColumnsForDelete
SelectKeyColumnsForDelete aggregate(groupBy(Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Reporting_Period),
	UniqueCount = count()) ~> AggregateAssetFundReportingPeriod
AggregateAssetFundReportingPeriod alterRow(deleteIf(UniqueCount>0)) ~> AlterRowDelete
AlterRowDelete sink(input(
		Asset_ID as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Timber_Sale_ID as integer,
		Reporting_Period as date,
		Species_Code as string,
		Customer as string,
		Domestic_Export as string,
		Product_Type_Code as string,
		Price_Point_Code as string,
		Sales_Unit_Code as string,
		Sales_Quantity as decimal(19,4),
		Sales_Revenue as decimal(19,4),
		Production_Cost as decimal(19,4),
		Stumpage as decimal(19,4),
		Unit_Stumpage as decimal(19,4),
		Currency_Code as string,
		Average_Sales_Price as decimal(19,4),
		Budget_Sales_Quantity as decimal(19,4),
		Budget_Sales_Revenue as decimal(19,4),
		Budget_Production_Cost as decimal(19,4),
		Budget_Stumpage as decimal(19,4),
		Insert_Datetime as timestamp,
		Update_Datetime as timestamp,
		Process_Name as string,
		Product as string,
		Delivery_Point_Code as string,
		Price_Point as decimal(19,4),
		Sales_Month as date
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:true,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	keys:['Asset_ID','Fund_ID','Reporting_Period'],
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Reporting_Period
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> TargetRelational

transformations.name: MapDrifted2
transformations.description: Creates an explicit mapping for each drifted column

typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		type as string,
		properties as (Asset_Id as string, Fund_Id as string, OBJECTID as string, Property as string, Crop_Type as string, Plant_Year as string, State as string, Area_Ha as double, SHAPE_Leng as double, SHAPE_Area as double),
		geometry as (type as string, coordinates as string)
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	backslashEscape: true) ~> geojsonmodified
Filter1 select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID = asset_id,
		Fund_ID = fund_id,
		Loc_Json = loc_json
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
geojsonmodified derive({_corrupt_record} = toString(byName('_corrupt_record')),
		asset_id = properties.Asset_Id,
		fund_id = properties.Fund_Id,
		loc_json = geometry.coordinates) ~> MapDrifted2
MapDrifted2 filter(not(isNull(asset_id))) ~> Filter1
Select1 sink(input(
		asset_id as string,
		fund_id as string,
		loc_geometry as binary,
		loc_json as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	truncate:true,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		asset_id = Asset_ID,
		fund_id = Fund_ID,
		loc_json = Loc_Json
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1

WorkbookName.defaultValue: Wenita Forestry Products Q4 FY20 V2.xlsx

MasterPipeline.defaultValue: Wenita Forestry Products Q4 FY20 V2.xlsx-Certifications

sqlReaderQuery.value:
SELECT COUNT(*) AS ERROR_COUNT FROM (
 SELECT DISTINCT LIS.Work_Book, LIS.Work_Sheet FROM 
 audit.OPS_Workbook_Worksheet_Asset_List LIS
 JOIN audit.OPS_Certification_Error ERR
 ON LIS.Work_Book = ERR.Source_File  
 AND LIS.Work_Sheet = ERR.Source_Sub_File
 WHERE LIS.Work_Book = '@{pipeline().parameters.WorkbookName}'
 AND LIS.Work_Sheet = '@{pipeline().parameters.Certifications}'
)x

WorkbookName.defaultValue: Wenita Forestry Products Q4 FY20 V2.xlsx
Wenita Forestry Products Q4 FY20 V2.xlsx

sqlReaderQuery.value:
SELECT COUNT(*) AS ERROR_COUNT FROM (
 SELECT DISTINCT LIS.Work_Book, LIS.Work_Sheet FROM 
 audit.OPS_Workbook_Worksheet_Asset_List LIS
 JOIN audit.OPS_Timber_Sales_Error ERR
 ON LIS.Work_Book = ERR.Source_File  
 AND LIS.Work_Sheet = ERR.Source_Sub_File
 WHERE LIS.Work_Book = '@{pipeline().parameters.WorkbookName}'
 AND LIS.Work_Sheet = '@{pipeline().parameters.TimberSales}'
)x

WorkbookName.defaultValue: Wenita Forestry Products Q4 FY20 V2.xlsx

source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT count(*) Total_Error
  FROM [staging].[COA_Adjustments]
  WHERE [validation_error] IS NOT NULL

SELECT count(*) Total_Error
  FROM [staging].[COA_Adjustments]
  WHERE [validation_error] IS NOT NULL

SELECT [ORIGINAL_BLOB_LANDING_CONTAINER],
	[ORIGINAL_BLOB_NAME],
	[ORIGINAL_BLOP_FULLPATH],
	[TARGET_BLOB_LANDING_CONTAINER],
	[TARGET_BLOB_NAME],
	[DATALAKE_CONTAINER],
	[DATALAKE_FILE_PATH],
	[ORIGINAL_BLOB_ARCHIVE_CONTAINER],
	[ORIGINAL_BLOB_ARCHIVE_FULLPATH],
	CONCAT(DATALAKE_CONTAINER,'/',DATALAKE_FILE_PATH,'/',TARGET_BLOB_NAME) AS DATALAKE_FULL_PATHFILE
FROM [log].[SOURCE_REGISTER_TABLE]
WHERE [ETL_IS_PROCESSED] = 'N'
AND [ORIGINAL_BLOB_NAME] LIKE 'MAS_MNL_ASSET_%'
ORDER BY [ORIGINAL_BLOB_NAME];

SELECT count(*) Total_Error
  FROM [staging].[COA_Budgets]
  WHERE [validation_error] IS NOT NULL
